messages.subject: "junk" television
messages.msgSnippet: Trekkies!! Yeah!!  I claim we raised our son in the one true faith -- Star Trek. ;-) (Please, no one slam me -- I am NOT implying anything about ANY
messages.messageBody:
"Trekkies!! Yeah!! I claim we raised our son in the one true faith --
Star Trek. ;-)

(Please, no one slam me -- I am NOT implying anything about ANY
religion!) I REALLY wish we had transporters and holodecks!"

I think you're safe here. We all joke about being "Holties".

Had this interesting discussion about the difference between Trekkies
and Star Wars geeks. Veeeerrrrry interesting........;)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: "junk" television
messages.msgSnippet: Ren, when are you going to write a book? Thank you, that was very sweet! I figured that so many folks confuse Rue and I, I ll just coast along on her
messages.messageBody:
"Ren, when are you going to write a book?"

Thank you, that was very sweet!
I figured that so many folks confuse Rue and I, I'll just coast along
on her coattails a while longer.;)

There are books within me....they're taking a bit of time to become
reality though.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
